title: Bangla
detail: Although Bengali is an Indo-European language, it has been influenced by other language families prevalent in South Asia

title: Physics
detail: Physics is the branch of science that deals with the structure of matter and how the fundamental constituents of the universe interact. It studies objects ranging from the very small using quantum mechanics to the entire universe using general relativity

title: Math
detail: The definition of math is the overall group of sciences that study numbers, shapes and their relationships.

title: Higher Math
detail: The definition of math is the overall group of sciences that study numbers, shapes and their relationships.

title: Biology
detail: Biology is a branch of science that deals with living organisms and their vital processes.

title: Chemistry
detail: Chemistry is the branch of science that deals with the properties, composition, and structure of elements and compounds, how they can change, and the energy that is released or absorbed when they change
